edu.umd.cs.psl.application.learning.weight.maxmargin

Class MinNormProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.application.learning.weight.maxmargin.MinNormProgram

  • public class MinNormProgram
extends java.lang.Object
    (for now) Solves convex programs of the form min ||weights .* x - origin||^2 + f'x s.t. Ax < b, x >= 0 by converting problem to a second order cone program

    • Field Detail

      • CONFIG_PREFIX

        public static final java.lang.String CONFIG_PREFIX
        Prefix of property keys used by this class.
        See Also:
        ConfigManager, Constant Field Values

      • CPS_KEY

        public static final java.lang.String CPS_KEY
        Key for ConicProgramSolverFactory or String property. Should be set to a ConicProgramSolverFactory (or the binary name of one). The ConicReasoner will use this ConicProgramSolverFactory to instantiate a ConicProgramSolver.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CPS_DEFAULT

        public static final ConicProgramSolverFactory CPS_DEFAULT
        Default value for CPS_KEY property. Value is instance of HomogeneousIPMFactory.

      • setQuadraticTerm

        public void setQuadraticTerm(double[] weights,
                    double[] origin)
        Sets the quadratic term in the norm minimization objective to be ||weight .* x - origin||^2
        Parameters:
        weights - positive weights to be multiplied element-wise with x
        origin - origin of the vector to compute the norm of. Set to all zeros to get traditional norm minimization

      • close

        public void close()
        detaches all saved references
